name: ACW Circular Walk 17X (eXtra to Tippers Hill)

ai.summary: An easy 1.1 km circular walk from eXtra to Tippers Hill in the UK. The route is short and gentle, suitable for beginners and families, with light scenery along mixed surfaces.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly gentle, flat to slightly undulating terrain. Surfaces include well-maintained paths and grassy sections; expect some uneven ground and potential muddy patches after rain.
ai.safety_notes: - Check weather and daylight hours before starting. - Wear sturdy, comfortable footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. - Stay on the marked path; carry a small map or GPS and a phone charged. - Inform someone of your plans, especially in unknown or rural areas. - Bring water and snacks; be cautious of slippery surfaces after rain.
recommended_gear: Sun protection in sunny weather (hat, sunscreen)
Map, guide or smartphone with route details
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer and Autumn are ideal; it is generally walkable year-round in the UK with appropriate clothing and footwear.
